header.label: OUR QUALITY POLICIES
header.intro: EMOF Teknoloji adopts flight safety, quality, and occupational safety as priorities at every stage of its production. All our processes comply with AS9100, ISO 9001, and ISO 45001 standards.

blocks.title: • Quality Management System
blocks.body: Our production processes are designed according to the AS9100 quality standard, and part traceability, process control, and documentation management are executed at the highest level.

blocks.title: • Occupational Safety & Environmental Policy
blocks.body: Employee health, environmental safety, and legal compliance are fundamental priorities in all our operations. We act with sustainable production principles.

blocks.title: • Continuous Improvement
blocks.body: EMOF Teknoloji continuously improves quality and production efficiency by increasing R&D and modernization investments every year.
